name: The Legend Of Tzolkin
description: Tzolkin, the calendar used by the Mayans, is responsible for marking and predicting important sacred events based on the deification of the Sun and Moon. After many battles between the ancient world civilizations, Tzolkin is lost, and Tahao, the only Mayan survivor, is trapped in the unbalanced worlds of day and night. Thus, Tahao sets out on an exciting adventure searching for Tzolkin, intending to balance the spirit worlds and save their culture and civilization. With an argument focused on explorers and achievers players, the game migrates between easy and hard fun, exploring tension, triumph, and relief techniques. Furthermore, it uses unlocking and conquest tools to arouse curiosity and intrigue the player. The duality is present in the variety of elements that mix day and night, in the construction of the narrative in past and future, and in similar behaviors that in different scenarios have different results. Balance and combine Sun and Moon skills to save your civilization. ★ Snap the level's elemental stone into the totem to level up. ★ Explore the torch's resources to utilize skills from both worlds and win the puzzle. ★ Break rocks to find collectible Kins. ★ Find the 4 elemental stones to complete the game.
